description: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET Multi-format HTML5 Document Viewer is the next-generation multi-format document-viewing technology for .NET developers. The DocumentViewer control supports viewing, form-filling, text searching (with OCR support) and printing PDF, DOCX, DOC, TXT, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. It works on both desktop(Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Linux, Mac OS X) and mobile browsers (IOS, Android, Windows Phone).
releaseNotes:
Version 2016 R3 - May 05, 2016
===================================
Enhanced
~~~~~~~~
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - Completely redesigned HTML5 Document Viewer control
    * Provides rich set of client side APIs
      + Introduced APIs for Quick Find operation
        - findFirst(), findNext(), findPrevious(), findLast()
      + All document level operations return JQueryPromise() object to get status info
      + Redesigned DocumentViewer initialization and “Preferences” class for ease of use
      + Redesigned event interface
        - Event registration through addEventListener() API on DocumentViewer object
        - Event de-registration through removeEventListener() API on DocumentViewer object
        - List of events supported
          * beforePageChange
            + afterPageChange 
            + beforeZoomChange
            + afterZoomChange 
            + beforeDocumentLoad
            + afterDocumentLoad 
            + beforeDocumentUpload
            + afterDocumentUpload
            + beforeDocumentPrint
            + afterDocumentPrint
            + beforeDocumentClose
            + onDocumentClose 
            + afterDocumentClose
            + beforePageRotate
            + afterPageRotate 
            + beforeDocumentDownload
            + afterDocumentDownload
            + beforeDocumentSave
            + afterDocumentSave 
    * Improved “Quick Find” experience
    * Redesigned toolbar UI for improved responsive behaviour
  - TypeScript support
    * TypeScript type definitions included
  - Interactive form filling
    * Fields supported
      + Text Field
        - Support for standard fields, combed fields, and password fields
      + Check Box
      + Radio Button
      + Push Button
        - Reset Action
          * Resets all fields
        - Submit Action
          * Supports HTTP GET and POST methods
      + Combo Box
      + List Box
    * Introduced APIs for submitting and resetting form fields
      + submitForm(submitUrl, submitMethod, includeFields): JQueryPromise
      + resetForm(fieldsToReset)
  - Introduced text search capability on scanned documents using OCR.
    * Properties to configure 
      + preferences.digitizerSettings.digitizationEnabled: boolean
      + preferences.digitizerSettings.textLanguage : string
  - Introduced “logger” class to enable logging of messages generated by DocumentViewer control on the browser console. 
    * Properties to configure 
      + logger.errorLogsEnabled: boolean
      + logger.infoLogsEnabled: boolean
summary: TypeScript Definitions (d.ts) Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET HTML5 Document Viewer
title: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET HTML Viewer TypeScript DefinitelyTyped
